医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
去除碎片？治疗疣？如果是医生做的，可以按手术计费去年夏天，俄勒冈州波特兰市的乔治·赖（George Lai）带他蹒跚学步的儿子去看儿科医生时，医生注意到孩子的手掌上有一个小碎片。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/Removing-a-splinter-Treating-a-wart-If-a-doctor-does-it-it-can-be-billed-as-surgery。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/Removing-a-splinter-Treating-a-wart-If-a-doctor-does-it-it-can-be-billed-as-surgery。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1656828-8078-474d-8c71-331280ee0c89 Fri, 13 Dec 2024 20:23:03 -0500 Removing a splinter? Treating a wart? If a doctor does it, it can be billed as surgery
更多的加州人被冻死。专家指出，无家可归的老年人较多。越来越多的人——其中许多是老年人和无家可归者——在冬天被冻死。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/More-Californians-are-freezing-to-death-Experts-point-to-more-older-homeless-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/More-Californians-are-freezing-to-death-Experts-point-to-more-older-homeless-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=752663fa-00d9-4c78-9d18-37f0994c6035 Fri, 13 Dec 2024 20:21:20 -0500 More Californians are freezing to death. Experts point to more older homeless people.
调查显示公众强烈希望获得有关人工智能在医疗保健中使用的通知超过 60% 的成年人重视获得有关医疗保健领域人工智能的信息，这强调了卫生系统中透明度和道德考虑的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/Survey-reveals-strong-public-desire-for-notification-about-AI-use-in-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/Survey-reveals-strong-public-desire-for-notification-about-AI-use-in-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=23a13861-3857-481c-b51a-417349a42db6 Fri, 13 Dec 2024 07:00:00 -0500 Survey reveals strong public desire for notification about AI use in healthcare
新调查显示，友谊促进老年人更健康的生活一项新的民意调查显示，无论是终生好友还是新近交往的好友，无论是离家近还是远在千里之外，朋友在 50 岁及以上成年人的生活和福祉中发挥着关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/Friendships-promote-healthier-living-in-older-adults-says-new-survey.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/Friendships-promote-healthier-living-in-older-adults-says-new-survey.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=028ddafd-970c-41b2-84f5-d19ef3b6452b Fri, 13 Dec 2024 06:56:55 -0500 Friendships promote healthier living in older adults, says new survey
深度学习通过单次 CT 扫描彻底改变 COPD 诊断，减轻患者负担根据今天发表在北美放射学会 (RSNA) 杂志《放射学：心胸影像》上的一项研究，仅使用一次吸入肺部 CT 扫描，深度学习模型就可以准确诊断和分期慢性阻塞性肺病 (COPD)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/Deep-learning-revolutionizes-COPD-diagnosis-with-single-CT-scan-reducing-patent-burden.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/Deep-learning-revolutionizes-COPD-diagnosis-with-single-CT-scan-reducing-patent-burden.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d8ef42a-41b8-4174-9f3f-33102f46d88a Fri, 13 Dec 2024 06:49:10 -0500 Deep learning revolutionizes COPD diagnosis with single CT scan, reducing patient burden
研究强调灵气对癌症门诊患者疼痛、疲劳和焦虑的影响最近在大学医院 Connor Whole Health 进行的一项研究评估了为癌症门诊患者设计的灵气计划，并在两个大学医院输液中心接受输液治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/Study-highlights-the-impact-of-Reiki-on-pain-fatigue-and-anxiety-in-cancer-out Patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/Study-highlights-the-impact-of-Reiki-on-pain-fatigue-and-anxiety-in-cancer-out Patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b8162a39-6f4f-4b7a-bb00-37830322a2d4 Fri, 13 Dec 2024 06:39:43 -0500 Study highlights the impact of Reiki on pain, fatigue, and anxiety in cancer outpatients
多组学分析揭示肺癌化疗免疫治疗耐药性该研究描述了肺癌肿瘤微环境的特征，将细胞组成与免疫治疗耐药性和潜在的治疗策略联系起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/Multi-omic-profiling-sheds-light-on-chemo-immunotherapy-resistance-in-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/Multi-omic-profiling-sheds-light-on-chemo-immunotherapy-resistance-in-lung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb48faef-1216-4c91-96cf-0371daaf8b6f Fri, 13 Dec 2024 06:17:00 -0500 Multi-omic profiling sheds light on chemo-immunotherapy resistance in lung cancer
针对先兆子痫的潜在新的基于 mRNA 的疗法靶向 VEGF mRNA 的脂质纳米粒子在小鼠模型中显示出治疗先兆子痫、恢复母体血压和增强胎儿健康的前景。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/Potential-new-mRNA-based-therapy-for-pre-eclampsia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/Potential-new-mRNA-based-therapy-for-pre-eclampsia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6e3cc83-35b3-4d0a-8fe3-e8efe60331f3 Fri, 13 Dec 2024 05:42:00 -0500 Potential new mRNA-based therapy for pre-eclampsia
新蛋白质平台增强癌症免疫治疗费城儿童医院 (CHOP) 和斯坦福大学的研究人员揭示了 TRACeR-I 的分子结构，TRACeR-I 是一种用于重编程免疫反应的蛋白质平台。更好地了解其结构可能有助于优化该平台的设计，该平台可通过直接修改免疫细胞或通过创建帮助免疫细胞定位癌细胞的蛋白质来开发癌症治疗方法。该研究结果今天发表在《自然生物技术》杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/New- Protein-platform-enhances-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/New- Protein-platform-enhances-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebac5ce5-d893-4f33-8531-6484bc33cc63 Fri, 13 Dec 2024 05:29:23 -0500 New protein platform enhances cancer immunotherapy
人工智能利用先进工具彻底改变癌症研究在理解肿瘤进展的分子和细胞机制方面已经取得了重大进展，但挑战仍然存在。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/AI-revolutionizes-cancer-research-with-advanced-tools.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241213/AI-revolutionizes-cancer-research-with-advanced-tools.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc916918-076d-4ca9-a946-985d686b5f71 Fri, 13 Dec 2024 05:22:00 -0500 AI revolutionizes cancer research with advanced tools
